name: OCKContactsListViewController
desc: A list view controller that automatically queries and displays contacts in a detailed contact view contoller.

items.name: init(storeManager: OCKSynchronizedStoreManager)
items.desc: Creates a contacts list view controller using a store manager.

items.name: let storeManager: OCKSynchronizedStoreManager
items.desc: The object that synchronizes between the store and controller.
